direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods deal with futures accounts and retrieve related information, but focus on different aspects (position risk vs. account details).
Both methods involve querying futures account information, but one focuses on position risk while the other provides a summary of the account.
Both methods interact with futures accounts, but one handles position risk while the other manages asset transfers.
The enableFutures method is a prerequisite for accessing futures-related functionalities, including futuresPositionRiskV2.
Both methods involve querying or managing futures-related data, but one focuses on position risk while the other deals with internal transfers.
